exercises.name: Supraclavicular lymph Node Surge
exercises.description: As a warm-up, swing lymph. Make it deep inhale, and as you exhale, place your palms with an edge over the collarbones. It will help launch lymphatic drainage. Do not overdo it strongly, you do not need to press.

exercises.name: Neck Exercise
exercises.description: Pump the lymph nodes under the line of the lower jaw. We start in the center under chin and go soft and smooth movements to the ears. It is important to work first underlying the lymph nodes, to ensure proper lymph drainage

exercises.name: Warming up the lymph
exercises.description: A very simple and effective drainage exercise lymph. Place your pointers fingers behind the ears, and the middle fingers in front of them. Scissor movement, easy pressing, slowly swipe down the side the surfaces of the neck to the collarbones.

exercises.name: Smoothing out wrinkles
exercises.description: Use your fingertips to lightly tap the orbital bone around the eyes. It will help tone the skin around the eyes and enhance microcirculation. And if in addition to apply cosmetic product, then it is better absorbed into the skin.

exercises.name: For headache
exercises.description: Place the pads fingers in the area under the eyebrows. Slowly tilt your head down creating opposition forehead and fingers. At the end of the working day, such exercise will help to remove tension in the forehead and around eyes.

exercises.name: Smoothing out wrinkles
exercises.description: Add the index and middle fingers on each hand, place them on the bridge of the nose.  Move in a circular motion under the eyes without affecting lower eyelids, towards to the temples.  This practice will help smooth out wrinkles around the eyes and paint bags, as well as to sharpen the cheekbones.

exercises.name: Acupressure
exercises.description: With one hand, lift eyebrow. Forefinger massage the other hand circular motions with light pressure the following points: - under the beginning of the eyebrow, - In the middle, - under the “tail” of the eyebrow. Acupressure massage improves the condition of the skin around the eyes and provides lifting eyebrows.

exercises.name: Smoothing out wrinkles
exercises.description: Pinch gently and crush with pads fingers skin at the outer corner of the eye. Grab the skin and slowly work through the whole relic area. Then do the same on the other side of the face. Exercise helps to reduce crow's feet and wrinkles on the temples, smooth the skin.

exercises.name: Cheeks
exercises.description: Put the indicative and averages fingers on the “apples”. In a circular motion massage the "beauty points". Strong and long lasting pressure contributes to a relaxation, weak and short-tons. Acupressure massage relieves fatigue and nervous overvoltage, improves skin tone.

exercises.name: Smoothing out wrinkles
exercises.description: Let's end our session applying healing energy. Rub your hands together to warm them up, and then place them near temples and eyes. Such meditation aims at smoothing wrinkles around the eyes. Make a few deep breaths and imagine how wrinkles disappear, muscles tone up, face becomes smoother with every breath.

exercises.name: Brow lift
exercises.description: Press your thumb pads against your temples. The side of the indexes fingers move from the brow area to Eyebrow tails. Exercise reduces eyebrow wrinkles and relieves tension at the end of the day.

exercises.name: Smoothing
exercises.description: The pad of the middle finger swipe down the lower eyelid from the bridge of the nose to the temple. Such movements will provide drainage of the lower eyelid, reduction of bags under eyes and paint bags.

exercises.name: Lifting
exercises.description: The fingers of one palm place on the side of chin, fixing this side of the face. Fingers another guide your palms along the other side of the face, slightly applying an effort, as if "pushing" the cheek along chewing muscle. Bring it to the inside under eye area. Linger at the outer corner eyes for 3 seconds. Then, loosening the pressure, move your fingers to the tragus of the ears and perform the final movement down the neck to clavicle. Repeat on the other side of the face.

exercises.name: Neck Exercise
exercises.description: Make head turns left - right. This simple exercise is excellent stretching for the neck, improves blood circulation head and firming muscles.

exercises.name: Lymph flow down the neck
exercises.description: Put four fingers right hand to the bone slightly behind the left ear and slide down your neck. Move slowly, don't press too hard. This simple exercise activates lymph flow and will help warm up the skin.

exercises.name: Exercising the eyes
exercises.description: In order to release the tension and eye fatigue, look alternately in one, then in the other side. Move top down. At the same time no need to turn the eye, move only apples.

exercises.name: Smoothing the forehead
exercises.description: Place your palms in the center of your forehead and, pressing firmly, gently lead to your temples. Then, reducing the force of impact, slowly move your palms down from the ears. along the neck to the collarbones. This will help reduce the puffiness above your eyebrows.

exercises.name: Smoothing out wrinkles
exercises.description: Use your fingertips to stroke the forehead in a circular motion, moving from center to contours. During the massage, try to lift the skin up, do not pull down. The result is relieving tension from the frontal muscle, reducing wrinkles on the forehead.

exercises.name: Smoothing out wrinkles
exercises.description: Alternately stroke your forehead with your palms in a criss-cross pattern, moving up from the eyebrows to the hairline. This movement will release tension from the forehead, reduce forehead wrinkles, anger wrinkles, provide lifting effect in the eyebrow area.

exercises.name: Smoothing out wrinkles
exercises.description: Place your palms at your eyebrows. Move upward, moving from the middle of the forehead to the temples. Such an exercise will provide an eyebrow lift and due to this is an upper eyelid lift. Suitable for relieving tension on the frontal muscle and smoothing out wrinkles on the forehead.

exercises.name: Smoothing out wrinkles in the brow
exercises.description: Place the pads of the index fingers over the wings of the nose. Perform stroking from the wings of the nose up to the bridge of the nose, then to the base of the eyebrows, then to the "tails" of the eyebrows. With this exercise, you will reduce the wrinkles between the brows and restore the correct position of the brows.

exercises.name: Smoothing forehead wrinkles
exercises.description: Press the fingers of both palms horizontally on your forehead and, applying pressure, move to the temples. With the help of this exercise, we remove excess fluid and prepare the forehead for further work.

exercises.name: Smoothing forehead wrinkles
exercises.description: Hold the skin on your forehead with your palms and raise your eyebrows, trying not to move hands. This strength exercise reduces forehead wrinkles, lifts the eyebrows and "opens" the upper eyelids.

exercises.name: Smoothing forehead wrinkles
exercises.description: Using your index fingers, work through the entire forehead area, with force stretching the skin in places of wrinkles. So you will improve blood circulation in this zone, increase the density of the skin and smooth forehead wrinkles.

exercises.name: Smoothing forehead wrinkles
exercises.description: Place your fingertips over your eyebrows and move them firmly up to the hairline. If you are not afraid ruin the hairstyle, extend the movement to the crown. Then lifting the effect of the eyebrows and upper eyelid will be more pronounced.

exercises.name: Head massage
exercises.description: Place your fingers behind your ears and forcefully make circular motions from ears up. This exercise helps restore the normal length of the muscles and achieve a lifting effect on the whole face.

exercises.name: Массаж Головы
exercises.description: Massage the back of the head in a circular motion from the hairline to tops of the head. This is a great exercise before applying products for hair growth to improve their effect, as it stimulates blood flow to the scalp.

exercises.name: Neck exercise
exercises.description: Wrap your hands around your cheeks - as if you are amazed at something. Without lifting your palms, slightly tilt your head forward - back. This will help strengthen the front of the neck, reduce the second chin and create a beautiful jaw line.

exercises.name: Neck Exercise
exercises.description: Put your hands on the back of your head, interlock your fingers, make small bends with your head back and forth. This exercise can be done anywhere, and there are a lot of benefits from it - blood flow to the head improves, muscle tension disappears, posture becomes even and preety. In combination with other exercises helps to maintain a beautiful cervical-chin angle.

exercises.name: Neck Exercise
exercises.description: Using the fingers of both hands, gently pinch the skin of the neck just below the jaw, moving from chin to ear. Try to keep the step of movement small. So you improve the tone of the skin of the neck (especially its front surface) and reduce sagging in this area.

exercises.name: Neck lymph
exercises.description: Place your hands behind your neck, then make a light stroking motion forward. This exercise relaxes the neck muscles, and activates circulation. blood and lymph.

exercises.name: Neck Exercise
exercises.description: Cross your arms over your chest, holding your skin. Slowly tilt your head back and forth trying to reach chin to palms. The result is a toned neck, a sharper chin line and a lifting of the lower third of the face.

exercises.name: Neck Exercise
exercises.description: Clasp your fingers on the back of your neck. Keep your elbows down. Make a small tilting the head back. This exercise will help you relax after work and tone your skin.

exercises.name: Voltage drop
exercises.description: Take a deep breath, lifting your shoulders vigorously. As you exhale, lower your shoulders as if throwing them down. This practice will relieve you of fatigue and stress at the end of the day, helps to relax the muscles of the neck and back.

exercises.name: Neck Exercise
exercises.description: Pinch your neck quickly and intensely on both sides, moving upward from shoulders to ears. At the same time, try to keep your head straight. This exercise is useful for fatigue and tension, strengthens and tones the skin of the neck, and also prevents sagging skin in this area.

exercises.name: Smooth rotations
exercises.description: Roll your head slowly in a circle periodically changing directions. Do not make sudden movements, they should be smooth. This is how you prepare muscles to massage and get rid of accumulated fatigue.

exercises.name: Improving complexion
exercises.description: Pinch your cheeks with quick, small movements, moving from the corners of the lips to the temples. Alternate this movement with pinching of the lower jaw area from the chin to the earlobes. This practice restores elasticity, firmness to the skin, makes the chin and cheekbones clear.

exercises.name: Chin
exercises.description: Place your palm parallel to your nose and your thumb under your jaw. Slightly push. Then smoothly move your palm from nose to ear, and use your thumb to work through the area under the jaw. This will help maintain the clarity of the facial contours and combat sagging tissues.

exercises.name: Chin
exercises.description: This exercise is effective against a double chin. Place your thumbs under the jaw line, clench the rest into a fist and place them on your chin. Slowly, with light pressure, spread your thumbs to the sides, massaging the area under the chin and lower jaw. This will prevent sagging of the skin in the lower third of the face.

exercises.name: Smoothing the jaw line
exercises.description: Press firmly enough to slide your thumbs under jaw line. Then, slowly and without pressure, run your palms along the neck to the collarbones. Thus, you will rid the tissue of excess fluid and make the line of the lower jaw clearer. It also provides prevention of sagging skin.

exercises.name: Lifting the corners of the mouth and cheekbones
exercises.description: Press your palms to the sides of your chin. Pressing lightly swipe up, along the nose, zygomatic bone, to the eyes. Feel your fingers lift your cheeks up. Then bring your fingers to your temples. From there, releasing the pressure, bring it to your ears and perform the final movement down the neck, to the collarbones. An excellent exercise for modeling the contours of the face and preventing plosis.

exercises.name: Chin
exercises.description: All fingers, except the thumb, squeeze in fist. Place your thumb in the middle of the chin, the rest under the jaw.With pressure, swipe along the lower jaw to the earlobe. The purpose of the exercise is to sculpt the face and prevent the loss of definition of its contours.

exercises.name: Lymphatic drainage of supraclavicular lymph nodes
exercises.description: Place your index and middle fingers over and under the collarbone. Slowly stroke from center to periphery. This is a great exercise for stimulation of the movement of lymphatic fluid.

exercises.name: Outline the jaw line
exercises.description: Squeeze four fingers of one hand into a fist, lock your thumb under chin, supporting it. With the thumb of your other hand, gently press under the jaw, then gently slide down the neck to the collarbone. So you can strengthen the outflow of excess fluid and sculpt the lower part of the face.

exercises.name: Chin
exercises.description: Place the base of your palms under your chin and sweep in a smoothing motion from the middle of your chin to your earlobes along the edge of the lower jaw. This exercise aims to improve contours of the face, sharpens the oval of the face, reduces flews and prevents their appearance.

exercises.name: Cheeks
exercises.description: Clench your hands into fists. Press firmly on the sides with the surface of your fists chin, and then move towards the temples. Exercise helps protect the skin from sagging, maintain a clear face contour.

exercises.name: Smooth purse-string wrinkles.
exercises.description: Hold the corner of your mouth with the palm of one hand. With two fingers of your other hand, massage the area above the upper lip in a circular motion. This exercise is effective for purse-string and expression wrinkles.

exercises.name: Chewing muscle relax
exercises.description: Place your fists under your cheekbones and massage in a circular motion. After a few repetitions, go a little lower. It is very important to release tension from the chewing muscles, as they work the most during the day.

exercises.name: Face lift
exercises.description: Place the chairs with your palms under your chin, press lightly. Then, with a little effort, move along the cheeks to the cheekbones, lifting the cheeks. In the area of the cheekbones, linger for 3 seconds. Then, with your fingers, slide from the ear tragus down the neck to the collarbones. This will help eliminate excess fluid and sagging skin in the middle third of the face.

exercises.name: Cheeks
exercises.description: Find the hollow part under the cheekbones. A pinching motion from the corners of the mouth to the ears will help define the cheekbones. Exercise tones muscles, tightens the skin, and improves complexion.

exercises.name: Cheeks
exercises.description: Place your palm on your cheek. Place your other palm on top to reinforce pressure. Swipe up towards your temple and then slowly go down the neck to the collarbone. This meditative, skin-tightening movement helps us complete the facelift.

exercises.name: Erasing the chin
exercises.description: Smooth the chin intensively with the fingers of both hands, making vertical movements towards the lower lip. This will reduce the appearance of wrinkles on the chin and lift the corners of the lips.

exercises.name: Cheek lift
exercises.description: Swipe across the cheek to the temple, first with one palm, then with the second. Alternate palms as if "picking up" the movement to keep the skin taut. This exercise will provide a lifting effect in the cheek area.

exercises.name: Ear lift
exercises.description: Use the pads of your index and thumb to gently press down on your earlobes and pull gently downward. By flexing the earlobes, you target acupuncture points that are responsible for overall health. organism, vigor and energy.

exercises.name: Nasolabial folds
exercises.description: Round your mouth (as if you are surprised by something) and index fingers massage the nasolabial folds up and down. Move slowly away from corners of the lips to the tip of the nose. This exercise is useful for the entire lower third of the face and especially for the reduction of nasolabial folds.

exercises.name: Relax the circular muscle of the mouth
exercises.description: Let’s relax the circular muscle of the mouth. Taking in air and blowing it out. To do this, utter the sound "TPRU", as if stopping the horse. The lips and muscles should vibrate. In order to achieve the best effect, you can lower your head down a little. In addition to relaxing the muscles, the bonuses of this anti-aging exercise are lip plumping and correction..

exercises.name: Parotid area lift
exercises.description: Place your index fingers behind your ears and your middle fingers in front of them. Using the scissors movement, rub the skin near the ears upward and way down. This exercise has a calming effect on the nervous
